welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wallaceburg! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of our small town, known for its rich history and scenic views. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chatham Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Chatham Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Clair County International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Clair County International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sarnia Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
